ext.description: Feel your typing through smartphone vibration
config.server.enabled: Start a local server for smartphone vibration
config.gettingStarted:
**You must run the Start command to activate Vibe Coding.**
You can also launch it from the Command Palette (`Ctrl+Shift+P` / `Cmd+Shift+P`).

[▶ Start](command:vibe-coding.start) | [⏹ Stop](command:vibe-coding.stop)
